trends: There have been 6 other sightings in Millinocket
There was one other sighting in Millinocket on or around June 19th 2012
divs: Sighting Details2 Friends and myself went out for a ride to go do a spot of fishing. we knew of this nice quiet place about 20 or so miles from town.we got there,unloaded the vehicle,got a small camp fire going and my friend's girlfriend who did not fish that night made a coment on how nice the scenery was and how all the stars seem to light up.well dark came and as we were packing up our poles we decided to just hang out for awhile and admire the view when we all seen these 3 lights in the sky that resembeled a triangle ,these lights did not blink but there were other lights on this craft that did blink.we viewed this event for about 5 minutes until we could not see it anymore.what ever it was sure was pretty.
